quotes.quote: The place of the father in the modern suburban family is a very small one, particularly if he plays golf.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: If you watch a game, it's fun. If you play at it, it's recreation.  If you work at it, it's golf.
quotes.author: Bob Hope

quotes.quote: Golf isn't a game, it's a choice that one makes with one's life.
quotes.author: Charles Rosin

quotes.quote: There's something intrinsically therapeutic about choosing to spend your time in a wide, open park- like setting that non-golfers can never truly understand.
quotes.author: Charles Rosin

quotes.quote: Although golf was originally restricted to wealthy, overweight Protestants, today it's open to anybody who owns hideous clothing.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: It is impossible to imagine Goethe or Beethoven being good at billiards or golf.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.quote: Golf and sex are about the only things you can enjoy without being good at.
quotes.author: Jimmy Demaret

quotes.quote: The income tax has made more liars out of the American people than golf has.
quotes.author: Will Rogers
